report.title: List plots in particular plot group.
report.description: List plots in particular plot group.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations plot LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id = plot.id AND lw.deleted JOIN groups_locations gl on gl.location_id = plot.id AND gl.group_id = #recording_group_id# AND gl.deleted=false JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id = plot.id AND lav.int_value = #plot_group_id# AND lav.location_attribute_id = #plot_group_location_attr_id# and lav.deleted=false WHERE plot.deleted=false AND plot.location_type_id = #plot_location_type_id# AND #website_filter#

param.name: plot_group_location_attr_id
param.description: The id of the location attribute that holds the plot groups for a plot.

param.name: plot_group_id
param.description: Id of current plot group being edited.

param.name: recording_group_id
param.description: Recording group ID of current project.

param.name: plot_location_type_id
param.description: Location type ID of a plot.
